definition: ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.english: All the morning flights get being booked up.
sentences.chinese: 所有明早的飞飞机票都预定光了。

sentences.english: Bob borrowed two thousand dollars from me, for he didn't have enough money to buy an airplane ticket.
sentences.chinese: 鲍伯向我借了两千元，因为他没有足够的钱买飞机票。

sentences.english: They have bought their air tickets already.
sentences.chinese: 她们已经买好了飞机票。

sentences.english: I'll pick up the ticket at the airport counter.
sentences.chinese: 我会在机场柜台拿飞飞机票。

sentences.english: Hotels can provide typing, photocopying , fax, air tickets, train tickets.
sentences.chinese: 酒店可提供打字，复印，传真，飞机票，火车票。

sentences.english: He hurried off with a plane ticket in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他手里捏着张飞机票匆忙地跑走了。

sentences.english: Proof of itinerary, including air tickets and hotel bookings.
sentences.chinese: 提供路线，包括飞机票和酒店预订。

sentences.english: I received a bank draft for a plane ticket.
sentences.chinese: 我收到了一张用来支付飞机票费用的银行汇票。

sentences.english: She had booked five tickets on the plane.
I'd like to book three plane tickets to San Francisco on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 我想订三张星期五去旧金山的飞机票。

sentences.english: Bob, who did not have enough money to buy an airplane ticket, borrowed two thousand dollars from me.
sentences.chinese: 鲍伯，没有足够的钱买飞机票，向我借了两千元。

sentences.english: Paolo: I can't. We have e-tickets. Airlines don't print tickets anymore.
sentences.chinese: 不行，我们买的电子飞机票，航空公司不再打印机票。

sentences.english: They have bought their plane tickets.
My name is Wang Wei and I'm calling to cancel plane ticket.
sentences.chinese: 我叫王微，我想取消我预定的飞机票。

sentences.english: Should you have any difficulty in getting the air tickets, please ring this number.
sentences.chinese: 万一你买飞机票有困难，请拨这个号码。

sentences.english: In addition, some high-income residents have purchased airline tickets, ready to fly abroad.
sentences.chinese: 此外，一些高收入居民纷纷购飞机票，准备飞往国外。

definition: to change one's reservation/to transfer to a different flight, airline, bus or train
to bounce (a check)/to return a ticket/ticket refund
airport construction fee (abbr. for 機場建設費|机场建设费)
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
to buy tickets/(Tw) to buy votes (in an election)
flight and hotel (travel package) (abbr. for 機票加酒店|机票加酒店[ji1 piao4 jia1 jiu3 dian4])
